summary:
Elvira Grey,
follower Stanalone
Currently residing at Hall of the dead Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=7&ved=0CE4QtwIwBg&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DLmSt1oEIshE&ei=FvqEVIWnM83fap_zgvgJ&usg=AFQjCNH64rzo-TA1oGzy7Lk2p7a3i0i3wQ&bvm=bv.80642063,d.d2s&cad=rja]
[/url][font=Comic Sans MS]Elvira[/font] Grey is seeking a Wealthy Husband and a new Mansion Beware, would need to a Hero or a Rich old man
Standalone follower currently residing at The Hall Of The Dead Whiterun
Elvira is a Sweet Girl at Heart, Very Mis understood
Class, SpellSword
New Version is SevenBase you will need to install
[url=http://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&sqi=2&ved=0CCEQFjAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F26800%2F&ei=zGSsVLfBHcXjap66gJgO&usg=AFQjCNGMGH9REqtAwQUy4xKbAe5mx8i2oA&sig2=iJjGKns7X7u1xTNYhY6G8w&bvm=bv.83134100,d.d2s]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url] or similar ,improved makeup changed hair
Not to keen on the hair might change it
Old Version is CBBE will improve it in future
[font=Comic Sans MS]Strengths destruction,restoration,onehanded weapons [/font]
She has quite alot of perks as i like to use just one follower at a time
Some of her Spells/Perks Fireball,Flames,Oakflesh,Raise zombie,Fast heal
Bladesman,Agile defender,Ranger,doom lady ability,magic resistance,ward absorb,Destruction expert
Fire mastery,stealth 60,Light foot,Mage armor 50,Savage Strike,Intense Flames, Expert locks
Starting Level 12, Levels up to 150,Weight 40 CBBE curvey , Race Nord/Bowerstonian [font=Comic Sans MS],Strong fire spells
Likes,[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]The SCIENCE OF POISONS,  exploring[/font], [font=Comic Sans MS]black roses[/font],[font=Comic Sans MS]taverns[/font] and [font=Comic Sans MS]sparkly things[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Hobbies, grave robbing[/font] ,plotting,flirting,

[font=Comic Sans MS]She is quite the catch[/font] [url=http://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&sqi=2&ved=0CCMQyCkwAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DFdRIlChq5tA&ei=wH6JVISYOcGuU76ihLAE&usg=AFQjCNEcNp_GVb54PONNRkQ0wXJ-t08Jxg&bvm=bv.81456516,d.d24]
[/url]
